purpose.ko: 병원 접수 창구에서 진료 접수를 합니다.
purpose.en: Check in at the hospital front desk.

whatToExpect.en: You will be asked to show your passport or ARC.

whatToExpect.ko: 방문 목적 또는 증상에 대해 간단히 물어봅니다.
whatToExpect.en: Staff may ask about your reason for visit or symptoms.

whatToExpect.ko: 보통 진료 과목 선택은 하지 않아도 되며, 증상에 따라 병원이 지정합니다.
whatToExpect.en: You usually don’t need to select a department. The hospital will guide you.

keyPhrases.en: I’d like to see a doctor.
This is my first time here.
Do I need to make an appointment?

actionGuide.ko: 증상을 간단히 설명 (통역 기능 활용 가능)

actionGuide.en: Receive a queue number or waiting slip.

tips.ko: 동네 병원은 예약 없이도 방문 가능. 대형병원은 사전 예약 필수인 경우 많음.
tips.en: Small clinics usually accept walk-ins. Big hospitals often require a prior appointment.

purpose.en: Wait to be called to the consultation room.

whatToExpect.en: You’ll wait in a seating area.

whatToExpect.ko: 번호 또는 이름이 화면에 표시되거나 방송으로 호출됩니다.
whatToExpect.en: Your name or number will be displayed on a screen or announced over a speaker.

keyPhrases.ko: 화장실 가도 괜찮나요? 제 차례 놓치지 않나요?
keyPhrases.en: Can I go to the restroom? Will I miss my turn?

actionGuide.en: Watch or listen for your turn.
Proceed to the consultation room when called.

purpose.en: Describe your symptoms to the doctor and receive a diagnosis.

whatToExpect.ko: 일부 의사는 영어가 유창하지 않을 수 있습니다.
whatToExpect.en: Some doctors may not speak fluent English.
Use simple English or the app’s interpreter tool.

keyPhrases.en: I have a sore throat and a fever.
I've had this pain for 3 days.

possibleQuestions.en: Do you have any medical history?

actionGuide.ko: 증상 기록이나 사진 보여주기 (약 복용 기록 등)
actionGuide.en: Show notes, photos, or lists if helpful.
Receive diagnosis and prescription from the doctor.

tips.ko: 짧고 명확하게 설명하고, 통역 기능을 적극 활용하세요.
tips.en: Speak clearly and use simple terms. Let the app assist when needed.

purpose.ko: 진료비를 결제하고 영수증 및 처방전을 받습니다.
purpose.en: Pay the consultation fee and receive any documents.

whatToExpect.en: You will receive a receipt and prescription here.

keyPhrases.ko: 보험 청구용 영수증 받을 수 있나요?
keyPhrases.en: Can I get a receipt for insurance?

actionGuide.en: Receive your receipt and prescription slip.

tips.en: Ask for a medical certificate if you plan to file an insurance claim.

purpose.ko: 병원에서 받은 처방전을 가지고 약을 받습니다.
purpose.en: Use the prescription to get your medication.

whatToExpect.en: Pharmacies are usually located near the hospital or clinic.
You must show your prescription slip.

keyPhrases.en: I’d like to get this prescription filled.
How do I take this medicine?

actionGuide.en: Go to a nearby pharmacy and present the prescription.

tips.ko: 필요시 영어 설명 요청 가능. 일부 약국은 외국인 대응이 가능합니다.
tips.en: Some pharmacies may offer basic English service. Don’t hesitate to ask for help.
